trans-unit.source: Represents the primary key field or fields of a record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示主键字段或字段的数据绑定控件中的记录。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> class using the specified dictionary of key field values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>类使用指定的键字段值的字典。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains the key field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含的键字段值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>类使用指定的键字段值的字典和数组的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>类使用指定的键字段值的字典和数组的字段名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The field values contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的字段值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>对象传入的`keyTable`参数用于填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This constructor also allows you to specify a list of the key field names for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object in advance through the `keyNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数还允许你指定的键字段名称的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象提前通过`keyNames`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Because the field names are specified in advance, only the key field values are stored in view state when this constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: 因为提前指定字段名称，只有键字段的值为视图状态中存储时使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The key field values.
trans-unit.target: 键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contain the names of the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 包含的键字段的名称的字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> array is equal to the current data key.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>数组是否等于当前的数据密钥。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>要比较的当前对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: object.
trans-unit.target: 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> array is equal to the current data key.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>数组是否等于当前的数据密钥。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The IsTrackingViewState property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: IsTrackingViewState 属性用于确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>是否在跟踪其视图状态更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field at the specified index from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取从指定索引处的键字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to retrieve the key field value.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，将检索的键字段值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field with the specified field name from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定的字段名称中的键字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key field for which to retrieve the key field value.
trans-unit.target: 为其检索的键字段值的键字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field with the specified field name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的域名称的键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: state is not and cannot be resolved to a valid .
trans-unit.target: state不是并且无法被解析为有效。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前视图状态保存<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>类以保存对象的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含的已保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState 属性用于确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>是否在跟踪其视图状态更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.LoadViewState method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.LoadViewState 方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前视图状态保存<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.SaveViewState method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: IStateManager.SaveViewState 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>类以保存对象的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含的已保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 标记开始跟踪并视图状态将更改保存到的起始点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象作为对象的视图状态的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 标记开始跟踪并视图状态将更改保存到的起始点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象作为对象的视图状态的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field at index 0 in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取中索引 0 处的键字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> property to retrieve a key field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object, you can use the Value property as a shortcut to determine the value of the key field at index 0 in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A>属性，以检索从一个键字段值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象，你可使用作为快捷方式的值属性确定中索引 0 处的键字段的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine the key field value of a record when the record has only one key field.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于确定何时记录包含只有一个键字段的记录的键字段值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object does not contain any key fields, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象不包含任何键字段，`null`返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field at index 0 in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中索引 0 处的键字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object that contains every key field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>对象，其中包含在每个键字段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object that contains every key field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用值属性来检索<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>对象，其中包含在每个键字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object is often used to iterate through the key fields of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>对象通常用于循环访问的键字段的记录。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains every key field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含在每个键字段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>。
